debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) (First-Time Buyers) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Planning and Development (Amendment) (First-Time Buyers) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000 to provide for a specific percentage of lands in a private development to be limited for purchase by first-time buyers and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le céatadán sonrach de thailte i bhforbairt phríobháideach a bheith teoranta lena gceannach ag ceannaitheoirí céaduaire agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Ceannaitheoirí Céaduaire), 2019

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Complaints of Anti-Social Behaviour and Neglect of Dwelling Exteriors) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to amend third party complaints and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun gearáin tríú páirtí a leasú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Complaints of Anti-Social Behaviour and Neglect of Dwelling Exteriors) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Gearáin mar gheall ar Iompar Frithshóisialta agus ar Fhaillí ar an Taobh Seachtrach de Theaghaisí) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Multi-Unit Developments (Amendment) (Sinking Fund) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Multi-Unit Developments Act 2011 to transfer responsibilities to the Minister for Housing, Planning and Local Government; to establish a sinking fund in year one of a development’s transfer of ownership; and to provide for other matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhorbairtí Ilaonad, 2011 chun freagrachtaí a aistriú chuig an Aire Tithíochta, Pleanála agus Rialtais Áitiúil; do bhunú ciste fiachmhúchta i mbliain a haon d'úinéireacht ar fhorbairt a aistriú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe eile.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhorbairtí Ilaonad (Leasú) (Ciste Fiachmhúchta), 2018

debates.showAs: Property Services (Regulation) (Amendment) (Management Company Regulation) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Property Services (Regulation) (Amendment) (Management Company Regulation) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Property Services (Regulation) (Amendment) Act 2011 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil) (Leasú), 2011 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil) (Leasú) (Cuideachtaí Bainistíochta a Rialáil), 2018

debates.showAs: Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012 to make provision for a partial exemption of property tax payable by a relevant owner whose property is located in a managed estate on which the owner of said property is liable to the payment of management fees and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Airgeadais (Cáin Mhaoine Áitiúil), 2012 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le páirt-díolúine i leith cáin mhaoine is iníoctha ag úinéir iomchuí a bhfuil a mhaoin nó a maoin suite in eastát bainistithe a bhfuil úinéir na maoine sin faoi dhliteanas táillí bainistíochta a íoc air agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaoiseamh i leith Táillí Bainistíochta (Cáin Mhaoine Áitiúil),  2018

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Rent Pressure Zones and Student Accommodation) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as amended by the Planning and Development (Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016) to extend rent pressure zone regulations to student accommodation.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe,2004 (arna leasú leis an Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Tithíocht) agus um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2016) d'fhonn na rialacháin creasa brú cíosa a leathnú chuig cóiríocht do mhic léinn.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Rent Pressure Zones and Student Accommodation) (Amendment) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Criosanna Brú Cíosa agus Cóiríocht do Mhic Léinn) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2018

debates.showAs: Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to increase competition in the public procurement tendering process by enhancing Small and Medium Sized Businesses ability to compete for public procurement tenders by allowing public bodies to have regard to economic, social and environmental well-being in connection with public services contracts; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do mhéadú iomaíochta sa phróiseas tairisceana um shainfháil phoiblí trí cur le cumas Gnóthaí Beaga agus Meánmhéide dul san iomaíocht le haghaidh tairiscintí sainfhála poiblí trína cheadú do chomhlachtaí poiblí aird a thabhairt ar an leas eacnamaíoch, sóisialta agus comhshaoil i dtaca le conarthaí seirbhísí poiblí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Poiblí agus um Shainfháil Phoiblí (Luach Sóisialta), 2017

debates.showAs: Moore Street Area Renewal and Development Bill 2015: Second Stage
Moore Street Area Renewal and Development Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide the grounds upon which certain approvals may be made by Moore Street Renewal Limited relating to existing or proposed buildings and premises in the Moore Street area, to provide that Moore Street Properties Limited shall be a development company for the Moore Street area and for the compulsory acquisition of land in that area by it, to authorise the Minister for Finance to guarantee borrowings by Moore Street Properties Limited, to make further provisions relating to Moore Street Renewal Limited and to Moore Street Properties Limited and to provide for connected matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do shocrú na bhforas ar a bhféadfaidh Moore Street Renewal Limited ceaduithe áirithe a dhéanamh i ndáil le foirgnimh agus áitribh láithreacha nó bheartaithe i limistéar Shráid an Mhúraigh, do dhéanamh socrú go mbeidh Moore Street Properties Limited ina chuideachta forbartha do limistéar Shráid an Mhúraigh agus maidir le fáil éigeantach talún sa limistéar sin aige, d'údarú don Aire Airgeadais airgead a gheobhaidh Moore Street Properties Limited ar iasacht a ráthú, do dhéanamh tuilleadh socruithe i ndáil le Moore Street Renewal Limited agus le Moore Street Properties Limited agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Moore Street Area Renewal and Development Bill 2015
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athnuachan agus Forbairt Limistéar Shráid an Mhúraigh, 2015

debates.showAs: Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2015: Committee and Remaining Stages
Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2015: Second Stage
Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require public bodies to have regard to economic, social and environmental well-being in connection with public services contracts; and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do cheangal ar chomhlachtaí poiblí aird a thabhairt ar an leas eacnamaíoch, sóisialta agus comhshaoil i dtaca le conarthaí seirbhísí poiblí; agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Public Services and Procurement (Social Value) Bill 2015
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Sheirbhísí Poiblí agus um Fháil Phoiblí (Luach Sóisialta) 2015

debates.showAs: Immigration Reform for U.S. Citizens Living in Ireland Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to facilitate reciprocity in the making available of employment permits for citizens of the United States of America and for that purpose to amend the Employment Permits act 2006 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'éascú cómhalartaíochta le linn ceadanna fostaíochta a chur ar fáil do shaoránaigh de chuid Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá agus chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta um Cheadanna Fostaíochta, 2006 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Immigration Reform for U.S. Citizens Living in Ireland Bill 2014
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú Inimirce do Shaoránaigh de chuid S.A.M. a Chónaíonn in Éirinn, 2014

debates.showAs: Suicide Prevention and Mental Health Fund Bill 2014: Second Stage
Suicide Prevention and Mental Health Fund Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby a levy shall be fixed on all alcoholic beverages sold from, but not intended for consumption on licenced premises, such levy shall be paid into a fund, to be known as the "Suicide Prevention and Mental Health Levy Fund" the monies from which shall be directed towards the support of suicide prevention (as set out in the policy document "Action Speaks Louder Than Words"), the accelerated role out of the policy document "A Vision For Change" and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína socrófar tobhach ar gach deoch alcólach a dhíoltar as áitreabh ceadúnaithe ach nach mbeartaítear a ól san áitreabh ceadúnaithe, go ndéanfar an tobhach sin a íoc isteach i gciste ar a dtabharfar "Ciste an Tobhaigh um Chosc ar Fhéinmharú agus um Meabhair-Shláinte" agus go ndíreofar an t-airgead as an gciste sin ar thacú le cosc ar fhéinmharú (mar a leagtar amach sa doiciméad beartais "Is Fearr Beart ná Briathar") agus ar an ról treisithe a eascraíonn as an doiciméad beartais "Fís Don Athrú", agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Suicide Prevention and Mental Health Fund Bill 2014
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán gCiste um Chosc ar Fhéinmharú agus um Meabhair-Shláinte, 2014

debates.showAs: NAMA and Irish Bank Resolution Corporation Transparency Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that, in the interests of transparency, all relevant details of loans, properties, or other assets offered for sale by or with the approval of NAMA or the Irish Bank Resolution Corporation be available to the public by means of publication on a website
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le trédhearcacht, chun go mbeidh na mionsonraí iomchuí uile maidir le hiasachtaí, maoine nó sócmhainní eile a thairgtear lena ndíol ag GNBS, nó lena ceadú, nó ag Corparáid na hÉireann um Réiteach Bainc, nó lena ceadú, ar fáil don phobal trína bhfoilsiú ar shuíomh gréasáin
bill.shortTitleEn: NAMA and Irish Bank Resolution Corporation Transparency Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrédhearcacht GNBS agus Chorparáid na hÉireann um Réiteach Bainc 2013

debates.showAs: Parental Leave Bill 2013: Committee Stage
Parental Leave Bill 2013: Second Stage
Parental Leave Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend Part II of the Maternity Protection Acts 1994 and 2004 to provide for both maternity and paternity leave for parents of a new born child and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Chuid II de na hAchtanna um Chosaint Mháithreachais, 1994 agus 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le saoire mháithreachais agus saoire atharthachta araon do thuismitheoirí linbh nuabheirthe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí, 2013

debates.showAs: Statute of Limitations (Amendment) (Home Remediation-Pyrite) Bill 2012: Second Stage (Resumed)
Statute of Limitations (Amendment) (Home Remediation-Pyrite) Bill 2012: Order for Second Stage
Statute of Limitations (Amendment) (Home Remediation-Pyrite) Bill 2012: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Statute of Limitations, 1957 to enable householders whose houses have been damaged by pyrite to institute a claim within a period of time commencing when the presence of pyrite within the house has been certified by an engineer
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Reacht na dTréimhsí, 1957 chun a chumasú do thíosaigh a ndearna pirít damáiste dá dtithe éileamh a thionscnamh laistigh de thréimhse ama dar tosach an tráth a dheimhneoidh innealtóir go bhfuil pirít laistigh den teach
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Reacht na dTréimhsí (Leasú) (Leasúchán Tí - Pirít), 2012
